message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially exceeding $800000.  I'm confident this product can be a game-changer for the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.  This is a limited-time offer, as I have another interested party, John, who is ready to purchase it for $800000. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
